Dammit. The game doesnt work for me.

Anybody else have this problem ?!?

Works fine!
I used the NODVD crack, found from mininova.

the game freeze at the loading step 4!
i do nodvd but nothing do. can someone say what to do?

game works... didnt need a crack!
sadly its not a great game. 
looks a lot like S.C.A.R race game.
thx for the upload.
its a follow up to the scars game... the shots ive seen of the dtm cars look cool tho.... but if your a racing fan get fia gt or toca 3 !!
when i start up the game, on the loading bar it just freezes at the 4th bar any one got solution

why are the files only 52.10 mb 
i don't know how do fix those files
